name: Kabuterimon
description: Kabuterimon's design is derived from the Asiatic rhinoceros beetle ( Oryctes rhinoceros ). It is a bipedal Digimon with four arms. Its head is eyeless and has a black skull helmet with a long horn. It has two pairs of large wings on its upper back. It is blue in coloration with black muscle in the torso, arms, and legs. It has a black stinger on its pelvis.
